special_ability_description: The pirate guard has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
action_name_1_description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
action_description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
character_description: Finn is a scrappy pirate with a weathered face and numerous scars. He wears a tattered leather vest and a red bandana.
unique_behaviors: Often sharpens his scimitar and whistles sea shanties.
useful_knowledge: Knows the layout of the pirate ship and can identify other crew members.
flaws_or_secrets: Has a secret fear of deep water due to a near-drowning incident.
other_items: A small pouch of stolen gold coins
backstory: Finn grew up in a coastal town and was orphaned at a young age. He joined a pirate crew for survival and has been with them ever since.
additional_notes: Finn is not very bright but is fiercely loyal to his crew. He can be bribed with enough gold.
